org.apache.cassandra.io.util

Class DataOutputStreamPlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.cassandra.io.util.AbstractDataOutput
        • org.apache.cassandra.io.util.DataOutputStreamPlus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, DataOutputPlus
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataOutputBuffer, DataOutputStreamAndChannel

    public class DataOutputStreamPlus
extends AbstractDataOutput
implements DataOutputPlus
    When possible use DataOutputStreamAndChannel instead of this class, as it will be more efficient. This class is only for situations where it cannot be used

      • write

        public void write(int oneByte)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractDataOutput
        Writes the specified byte oneByte to this RandomAccessFile starting at the current file pointer. Only the low order byte of oneByte is written.
